DOC.brief_summary: This international , multi-center , randomize , double blind , placebo control study AMG 785 skeletally mature adult fresh unilateral tibial diaphyseal fracture status post definitive fracture fixation intramedullary ( IM ) nail . The primary hypothesis study AMG 785 compare placebo effective reduce radiographic healing time fresh tibial diaphyseal fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Study AMG 785 Tibial Diaphyseal Fractures Status Post Intramedullary Nailing
DOC.criteria: Skeletally mature adult , age 18 85 year radiographically close growth plate Fresh unilateral close Gustilo type I type II open tibial fracture Definitive fracture fixation ream ( closed open fracture ) unreamed ( open fracture ) intramedullary nail Major polytrauma significant axial trauma Associated low extremity fracture delay subject 's ability bear weight beyond normal time expect tibial shaft fracture Use bone graft time fracture fixation Pathological fracture metabolic bone disease History symptomatic spinal stenosis facial nerve paralysis Malignancy within last 5 year Evidence follow ( currently within past 5 year ) : elevate transaminase , significantly impaired renal function , current hyper hypocalcaemia Use agent affect bone metabolism Subject refuse use appropriate method contraception
